description.p: Settings for adding a "lookup", such as an Auto-suggest or Edit-Combo list, to a control.

discussion.p: When you check the checkbox next to the *[ui:Lookup]* property, you will notice that two additional properties appear. These are the *[ui:Lookup Type]* and *[ui:Lookup definition]* properties. Three types of lookups are available: Auto-suggest List, Edit-Combo List, and Grid component.

description.p: The Grid must be updateable before you can add a Lookup to a control. You can set a field to be updateable from the grid Fields page by clicking the *[ui:(editable?)]* checkbox above the *[ui:Selected:]* fields list.

figure.title: The editable? checkbox enables field editing
figure.alt: The editable? checkbox enables field editing
